name: relsset

body.origin:
|- wrel(csset)
-| wss(csset, cxp(universe, universe))
-| wb(wrel(csset), wss(csset, cxp(universe, universe)))

-| wss(csset, cxp(universe, universe))
-| wb(wrel(csset), wss(csset, cxp(universe, universe)))

-| wss(cdif(cxp(universe, universe), crn(ctxp(cep, cdif(universe, cep)))), cxp(universe, universe))

⊢ Rel(SSet)
⊣ (Rel(SSet)↔ SSet ⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌))
⊣ SSet =((𝕌 × 𝕌)\ ran((∈(×)(𝕌 \ ∈))))
⊣ ((𝕌 × 𝕌)\ ran((∈(×)(𝕌 \ ∈))))⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌)
